name: led.toggle()
content:
Alternates from turning the red LED on and  off

Changes based on the current state of the LED. If the LED is on when you use `led.toggle()`, then it will turn off after being called.

examples.name: Toggle by 3's
examples.description: Every third time you press the left button, toggle!

short_description: Alternates from turning the red LED on and  off
